definition: If you work at it hard enough, you can grind an iron bar into a needle./cf idiom 磨杵成針|磨杵成针, to grind an iron bar down to a fine needle (idiom); fig. to persevere in a difficult task/to study diligently
pinyin: zhi3 yao4 gong1 fu5 shen1 , tie3 chu3 mo2 cheng2 zhen1
simplified: 只要功夫深，铁杵磨成针
word: 只要功夫深，鐵杵磨成針

definition: important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if
(classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)
to rub/to grind/to polish/to sharpen/to wear down/to die out/to waste time/to pester/to insist
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
